      and "B mod 3 ≠ 0"
  shows "100 * A + 10 * B + C = 129"
  sorry

end

3.formalization:
theory test
imports Complex_Main
begin

fun p :: "nat ⇒ nat" where
  "p n = n^2 - n + 41"

theorem euler_polynomial:
  fixes n :: nat
  assumes "gcd (p n) (p (n + 1)) > 1"
  shows "n = 41"
  sorry

end

17.formalization:
theory test
imports
  Complex_Main
begin

theorem functional_inverse:
  fixes f h :: "real ⇒ real"
  assumes "∀x. h (f x) = x" and "∀x. f (h x) = x"
  and "h 2 = 10"
  and "h 10 = 1"
  and "h 1 = 2"
  shows "f (f 10) = 1"
proof -
  from assms(2) have "f 1 = 10" by (metis assms(4))
  moreover from assms(2) have "f 10 = 2" by (metis assms(3))
  ultimately have "f (f 10) = f 2" by simp
  also from assms(2) have "f 2 = 1" by (metis assms(5))
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

end
